authEvents.description: runs before sign-up/sign-in to customize the flow

header.headline: Ship fullstack with joy
header.tagline: Type-safe APIs, shared packages, auth & docs out of the box. Built for developer experience.
header.stack: Turbo 路 Nest 路 tRPC 路 Next 路 Bun

Landing.selectFeaturePrompt: Select a feature above to see details.
Landing.templateSubtitle: Turbo Nest Trpc Next - Boiler plate monorepo (Bun)

descriptions.fullstackTypeSafety: Create a NestJS endpoint and call it from the frontend with complete type safety.
descriptions.shareResources: Create a simple React component and share it between your apps.
descriptions.storybook: Create your stories and develop your components in isolation.
descriptions.typedEnv: Typed and validated environment variables at startup.
descriptions.internationalisation: Use next-intl to translate your application easily.
descriptions.apiProtection: AuthGuardRouter + @Public for public routes, protected routes require a session. Try both fetches below.
descriptions.autoDoc: We use trpc-ui to expose your tRPC API. The documentation is generated automatically from your routers and Zod schemas.
descriptions.authentication: Sign in, sign up and session management on the front-end with Better Auth.
descriptions.logging: Use AuthGuardRouter with logs: true to get formatted request logs (URL, meta, response) in the terminal.

step7.title: Auto documentation
step7.intro: We use trpc-ui to expose your tRPC API. The documentation is generated automatically from your routers and Zod schemas.
